item.title: Class!
item.description:
I swear 9am lectures are my worst enemies… Especially when the next class is at 1:30pm!! They should’ve just kept the lecture before class… It’s not the worst thing in the world though, since I usually go to a cafe with my friends in the down-time.


Learning about street posters.

Sitting at the back is fun because I can see what everyone else is distracted by…

item.title: Posting from mobile...?
item.description:
I just downloaded the app Working Copy on my iPhone so that I can clone my git repository and create markdown files on the go! I also got the app Bear for nicer mark-down editing.


Working copy.

item.title: Just a work and uni kinda day...
item.description:
Now that I have a system (kinda) working with Hugo and Neocities, I can focus on just writing my blog! Yay. Today, I just went to work and had classes between my shifts. To be honest, the whole day, I was just thinking about how I can get my website to automatically push itself to Neocities… ðŸ˜†

I think I might’ve figured it out by using the Github actions: Deploy to Neocities. I’ll update to let you know if it actually works.

Class today was fun… We just played around with inks and the like. Messy, but fun.
